doc.title: A Tale of Two Cities
doc.plot: Explaining the 2005 distinctions of Camden being the "Most Dangerous City in America" and Moorestown being the "Best Place to Live in America" while having the perspective of Charles Dickens' 1859 novel of the same title. It features the residents of the two cities and many of Rutgers-Camden's faculty experts in the fields of Psychology, History, Criminology, and Urban Studies discussing the problems and situations.
